title: Top Global Health Service Coverage
description: In 2021, Canada achieved a UHC service coverage index of 91, placing it among the highest globally for universal health coverage.

title: Full Female Secondary School Enrollment
description: As of 2017, Canada reported a 100% net enrollment rate for females in secondary education, indicating full participation.

title: Significant Portfolio Equity Outflows
description: In 2023, Canada experienced a net outflow of portfolio equity amounting to -$35.8 billion, reflecting a substantial capital movement out of the country.
